PageInfo.Message:
Within the Custom-Made Workshop, the <COL
ffdc78>Ultimate Synthesis of Arms</COL> is
available.
By obtaining the following two items, you can
perform it as many times as you want:
① A <COL ffdc78>specific weapon</COL>
strengthened up to ★4
(Refer to the image for weapons with a prism
icon)
② The required materials and Rift Crystals

Ultimate synthesis is different from regular
enhancement, as it significantly boosts attack
performance.
For each weapon, the first synthesis can be done
using the required materials and Rift Crystals.
If you want to attempt ultimate synthesis again
on equipment that has already undergone it, you
will need <COL ffdc78>Golden Gemstones instead of
Rift Crystals.</COL>

In addition, if you attempt the Ultimate
Synthesis multiple times, <COL ffdc78>the
performance will be overwritten each time</COL>,
so
let's perform it while thoroughly confirming the
results granted upon success.
